tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE constituent_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  constituent_name VARCHAR(255),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE feedback_data ( feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, constituent_id UUID, feedback_text TEXT, feedback_date TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE policy_decisions ( decision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, decision_title TEXT, decision_date TIMESTAMP, decision_description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE constituent_data (
    constituent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fullname VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    address TEXT,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE constituent_details (
    constituent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_survey_responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  respondent_name VARCHAR(255),
  feedback TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_issues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_title VARCHAR(255),
  issue_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE priority_list (
  priority_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  priority_title VARCHAR(255),
  priority_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_category_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (feedback_id) REFERENCES feedback_survey_responses(response_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES feedback_categories(category_id)
)
